name: Crossroad Tales: Co-Op Stories
description:
Crossroad Tales is a cooperative interactive story app where you and your friend’s decisions affect the story’s outcome. Laugh, cry, throw your hands up as you and a friend experience a roller coaster of emotions. Bring a friend, and choose together!

Invite friends and immerse yourselves in tales of drama, mystery, and suspense. Quickly discuss how your characters will interact with other characters in each story using voice chat. Don’t take too long to decide as it may affect your relationship with them.

Your Group Decisions affect each story's multiple endings.

Solo Play also offers a rich background for many stories.

Customize your characters how you like. There are a variety of hair styles, colors, and outfits to choose from. Show off your style with your friends!

New stories and chapters await you every week!
We will be releasing more stories across many genres for you and your friends to experience regularly. Don't miss out!

SENIOR SLEUTHERS - Astraea Gloria Academy is the most prestigious educational institution in the country, and becoming its valedictorian ensures money, glory, and status. It hasn't been easy, but your path to valedictorian is finally within reach...

CAMP CHAOS - You and your best friend are working at the camp you love. This summer job is a dream come true... Or it was until the head counselor mysteriously disappeared!
What happened to her? Where did she go? You and a friend must unravel the mystery of these woods!
